## mleap_load_bundle

## Description
Loads an MLeap bundle


## Usage
```r
mleap_load_bundle(path)
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| path | Path to the exported bundle zip file. |


## Value
An MLeap model object.
